name: Egg Climbing
description:
Egg Climbing: Endless Jumper is a mobile game made by one person company "onbox GAMES", me. It is available on Google Play. Fell free to leave a comment of what do you think about the game.

The game is about an Egg that falled from an infinite tree and he needs to reach his nest again following the feathers along the way up.

There are difrents eggs in the game and each one has diferent resistance, so the journey is unique every time you play it.

Hope you guys enjoy it.
